servers.title: OpenAI (Official)
servers.description: Official OpenAI API endpoint - requires valid API key

servers.title: Pollinations AI
servers.description: Free AI text generation service with OpenAI-compatible API

servers.title: SuperSigmaProxy (SSP)
servers.description: Proxy that hosts both Pollinations' models and free models from OpenRouter (created by Gen1x)

servers.title: PenguinAI
servers.description: Proxy originally made for the PenguinAI extension (created by the PenguinAI team), streaming doesn't work for now.

servers.title: derpygamer2142's proxy (OUTDATED
servers.description: Proxy originally made for the PenguinAI extension (created by derpygamer2142), VERY outdated, the only models that work are the free ones
